entry.title: Sanjeev Kumar Twin Brother Confusion Comedy Scene -- Angoor
entry.content:
![Sanjeev Kumar twin brother confusion comedy scene -- Angoor](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/xTcK5iWVn24/hqdefault.jpg =640x380)
![Sanjeev Kumar twin brother confusion comedy scene -- Angoor](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/xTcK5iWVn24/1.jpg =1580x150)
![Sanjeev Kumar twin brother confusion comedy scene -- Angoor](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/xTcK5iWVn24/2.jpg =1580x150)
![Sanjeev Kumar twin brother confusion comedy scene -- Angoor](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/xTcK5iWVn24/3.jpg =1580x150)

Watch the hit comedy scene from the bollywood classic romantic comedy hindi movie Angoor (1982) starring Sanjeev Kumar, Maushmi Chatterjee, Deven Verma, Shammi & Utpal Dutt. Directed by Gulzar & Produced by Jai Singh. Music by R.D Burman. The film is about two pairs of identical twins separated at birth and how their lives go haywire when they meet in adulthood.

Enjoy this classic comedy song “Meri Pyari Bindu” starring superstars Kishore Kumar & Sunil Dutt from the evergreen comedy movie Padosan directed by Jyoti Swaroop. Music composed by R.D Burman. Cast: Mehmood, Saira Banu, Om Prakash, Agha, Mukri Keshato Mukherjee

entry.title: Yeh Item Koun Hai - Shaadi Se Pehle - Akshaye Khanna & Mallika Sherawat - Bollywood Funny Scene
entry.content:
![Yeh Item Koun Hai - Shaadi Se Pehle - Akshaye Khanna & Mallika Sherawat - Bollywood Funny Scene](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/ioJQag0cr_0/hqdefault.jpg =640x380)
![Yeh Item Koun Hai - Shaadi Se Pehle - Akshaye Khanna & Mallika Sherawat - Bollywood Funny Scene](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/ioJQag0cr_0/1.jpg =1580x150)
![Yeh Item Koun Hai - Shaadi Se Pehle - Akshaye Khanna & Mallika Sherawat - Bollywood Funny Scene](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/ioJQag0cr_0/2.jpg =1580x150)
![Yeh Item Koun Hai - Shaadi Se Pehle - Akshaye Khanna & Mallika Sherawat - Bollywood Funny Scene](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/ioJQag0cr_0/3.jpg =1580x150)

Watch Bollywood Funny Scene “Yeh Item Koun Hain” – Akshaye Khanna, Sunil Shetty & Mallika Sherawat from Shaadi Se Pehle – 2006 – Bollywood Movie With English Subtitles Produced by – Subhash Ghai, Directed by – Satish Kaushik, Starring – Akshaye Khanna, Ayesha Takia, Mallika Sherawat, Sunil Shetty, Aftab Shivdasani, Anupam Kher, Gulshan Grover, Vijayendra Ghatge, Dinesh Hingoo, Boman Irani, Hemang Tanna, Mita Vasisht, Rajpal Yadav; Music by – Himesh Reshammiya. The movie is a slapstick romantic comedy that tells the story of a man caught between two girls – his gorgeous girlfriend and a sexy model.
